html:
counsel together. Those who make and worship idols are to ask if they can find any evidence that the idols have been able to prophesy accurately, as the Lord has done.

declared this from ancient time. The Lord has declared his sovereignty and dominion from the beginning, whereas the idols have consistently shown themselves to possess neither.

no God else beside me. This idea is repeated three times in this verse and the next. The nations may worship many gods, but there is only one true God, with power to declare and to bring to pass. That God is Jehovah.
